name: openjpeg
raw_recipe:
package:
    name: openjpeg
    version: 2.1.0

source:
    fn: version.2.1.tar.gz
    url: https://github.com/uclouvain/openjpeg/archive/version.2.1.tar.gz

build:
    number: 1
    skip: True  # [win]

requirements:
    build:
        - cmake
        - libtiff
        - libpng
        - zlib
    run:
        - libtiff
        - libpng
        - zlib

test:
    files:
        - p0_01.j2k
    commands:
        - opj_dump -i p0_01.j2k

about:
    home: http://www.openjpeg.org/
    license: 2-clauses BSD (https://github.com/uclouvain/openjpeg/blob/master/LICENSE)
    summary: An open-source JPEG 2000 codec written in C

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ocefpaf
    - gillins

about.summary: An open-source JPEG 2000 codec written in C
